title: Bagisto
description: An easy to use, free and open source laravel eCommerce platform to build your online shop in no time.

title: Magento
description: Magento is an open-source e-commerce platform written in PHP. It uses multiple other PHP frameworks such as Laminas and Symfony.

title: nopCommerce
description: ASP.NET Core eCommerce software. nopCommerce is a free and open-source shopping cart.

title: Odoo
description: Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.

title: Opencart
description: A free shopping cart system. OpenCart is an open source PHP-based online e-commerce solution.

title: OSCommerce
description: OsCommerce is an e-commerce and online store-management software program. It can be used on any web server that has PHP and MySQL installed. It is available as free software under the GNU General Public License.

title: Prestashop
description: PrestaShop is an Open Source e-commerce platform, committed to providing the best shopping cart experience for both merchants and customers.

title: Saleor
description: A modular, high performance, headless e-commerce platform built with Python, GraphQL, Django, and React.

title: Shopware
description: Shopware 6 is an open commerce platform based on Symfony Framework and Vue and supported by a worldwide community and more then 1.500 community extensions.

title: Snipcart
description: Add a shopping cart to any website.

title: Spree
description: Open Source headless multi-language/multi-currency/multi-store eCommerce platform.

title: Sylius
description: Sylius is an Open Source Headless eCommerce Platform based on Symfony.

title: Woocommerce
description: A customizable, open-source eCommerce platform built on WordPress. Build any commerce solution you can imagine.
